channel.title: triple armor clad ❧
channel.description: Recent content on triple armor clad ❧

item.title: Links Outta Here
item.description: It’s 2020 and web-rings don’t exist anymore, but not all websites lend well to discovery through search or social media. This is a living document of cool, or at least interesting, websites that I’ve come across and want to remember: Owen Cyclops’s website. Mystical artwork and funny, transgressive comics. “Conspiracy Theorists” Lasha Darkmoon’s articles Actual Conspiracy Theorists Miles Mathis’s writings. Believes that pi (π) is actally 4, that differential calculus is flawed, and that a lot of modern physics is fundamentally incorrect.

item.title: What is This?
item.description: “triple armor clad” itself is a reference to Ragnar Redbeard’s Might Is Right (1896): It is notorious, universally so, that the blackest falsehoods are ever decked out in the most brilliant and gorgeous regalia. Clearly, therefore it is the brave man’s duty to regard all sacred things, all legal things, all constitutional things, all holy things, with more than usual suspicion. “I deny, and I affirm,” is the countersign of material freedom.
